ace-of-cups.upright: Pure emotion and intuition surges in; accept this fresh invitation around relationships and emotional flow.
ace-of-cups.reversed: Blocked emotion and intuition or hesitation keeps the seed from sprouting.

ace-of-pentacles.upright: Pure stability and material progress surges in; accept this fresh invitation around resources, body, and practical work.
ace-of-pentacles.reversed: Blocked stability and material progress or hesitation keeps the seed from sprouting.

ace-of-swords.upright: Pure clarity and discernment surges in; accept this fresh invitation around thoughts, communication, and truth.
ace-of-swords.reversed: Blocked clarity and discernment or hesitation keeps the seed from sprouting.

ace-of-wands.upright: Pure momentum and creative fire surges in; accept this fresh invitation around inspiration, ambition, and passion.
ace-of-wands.reversed: Blocked momentum and creative fire or hesitation keeps the seed from sprouting.

two-of-cups.upright: Balance and choice shape your relationships and emotional flow; harmonize two priorities with care.
two-of-cups.reversed: Indecision or imbalance around relationships and emotional flow needs honest recalibration.

two-of-pentacles.upright: Balance and choice shape your resources, body, and practical work; harmonize two priorities with care.
two-of-pentacles.reversed: Indecision or imbalance around resources, body, and practical work needs honest recalibration.

two-of-swords.upright: Balance and choice shape your thoughts, communication, and truth; harmonize two priorities with care.
two-of-swords.reversed: Indecision or imbalance around thoughts, communication, and truth needs honest recalibration.

two-of-wands.upright: Balance and choice shape your inspiration, ambition, and passion; harmonize two priorities with care.
two-of-wands.reversed: Indecision or imbalance around inspiration, ambition, and passion needs honest recalibration.

three-of-cups.upright: Co-creation multiplies relationships and emotional flow; collaborate and celebrate early progress.
three-of-cups.reversed: Misalignment among allies slows relationships and emotional flow; revisit shared values.

three-of-pentacles.upright: Co-creation multiplies resources, body, and practical work; collaborate and celebrate early progress.
three-of-pentacles.reversed: Misalignment among allies slows resources, body, and practical work; revisit shared values.

three-of-swords.upright: Co-creation multiplies thoughts, communication, and truth; collaborate and celebrate early progress.
three-of-swords.reversed: Misalignment among allies slows thoughts, communication, and truth; revisit shared values.

three-of-wands.upright: Co-creation multiplies inspiration, ambition, and passion; collaborate and celebrate early progress.
three-of-wands.reversed: Misalignment among allies slows inspiration, ambition, and passion; revisit shared values.

four-of-cups.upright: A grounding pause integrates recent lessons about relationships and emotional flow.
four-of-cups.reversed: Stagnation or apathy fades once you reengage intentionally.

four-of-pentacles.upright: A grounding pause integrates recent lessons about resources, body, and practical work.
four-of-pentacles.reversed: Stagnation or apathy fades once you reengage intentionally.

four-of-swords.upright: A grounding pause integrates recent lessons about thoughts, communication, and truth.
four-of-swords.reversed: Stagnation or apathy fades once you reengage intentionally.

four-of-wands.upright: A grounding pause integrates recent lessons about inspiration, ambition, and passion.
four-of-wands.reversed: Stagnation or apathy fades once you reengage intentionally.

five-of-cups.upright: Challenge shakes your relationship with relationships and emotional flow; process the disruption.
five-of-cups.reversed: Lessons integrate and resilience grows after the hardship.

five-of-pentacles.upright: Challenge shakes your relationship with resources, body, and practical work; process the disruption.
five-of-pentacles.reversed: Lessons integrate and resilience grows after the hardship.

five-of-swords.upright: Challenge shakes your relationship with thoughts, communication, and truth; process the disruption.
five-of-swords.reversed: Lessons integrate and resilience grows after the hardship.

five-of-wands.upright: Challenge shakes your relationship with inspiration, ambition, and passion; process the disruption.
five-of-wands.reversed: Lessons integrate and resilience grows after the hardship.

six-of-cups.upright: Kind exchanges and generosity bring harmony to relationships and emotional flow.
six-of-cups.reversed: Unequal flow or nostalgia keeps you stuck; rebalance giving and receiving.

six-of-pentacles.upright: Kind exchanges and generosity bring harmony to resources, body, and practical work.
six-of-pentacles.reversed: Unequal flow or nostalgia keeps you stuck; rebalance giving and receiving.

six-of-swords.upright: Kind exchanges and generosity bring harmony to thoughts, communication, and truth.
six-of-swords.reversed: Unequal flow or nostalgia keeps you stuck; rebalance giving and receiving.

six-of-wands.upright: Kind exchanges and generosity bring harmony to inspiration, ambition, and passion.
six-of-wands.reversed: Unequal flow or nostalgia keeps you stuck; rebalance giving and receiving.

seven-of-cups.upright: Vision and evaluation refine how you pursue relationships and emotional flow; choose wisely.
seven-of-cups.reversed: Scattered effort or avoidance clouds relationships and emotional flow; commit to one path.

seven-of-pentacles.upright: Vision and evaluation refine how you pursue resources, body, and practical work; choose wisely.
seven-of-pentacles.reversed: Scattered effort or avoidance clouds resources, body, and practical work; commit to one path.

seven-of-swords.upright: Vision and evaluation refine how you pursue thoughts, communication, and truth; choose wisely.
seven-of-swords.reversed: Scattered effort or avoidance clouds thoughts, communication, and truth; commit to one path.

seven-of-wands.upright: Vision and evaluation refine how you pursue inspiration, ambition, and passion; choose wisely.
seven-of-wands.reversed: Scattered effort or avoidance clouds inspiration, ambition, and passion; commit to one path.

eight-of-cups.upright: Disciplined action moves you forward in relationships and emotional flow; stay aligned.
eight-of-cups.reversed: Burnout or fear of change blocks movement—adjust the route.

eight-of-pentacles.upright: Disciplined action moves you forward in resources, body, and practical work; stay aligned.
eight-of-pentacles.reversed: Burnout or fear of change blocks movement—adjust the route.

eight-of-swords.upright: Disciplined action moves you forward in thoughts, communication, and truth; stay aligned.
eight-of-swords.reversed: Burnout or fear of change blocks movement—adjust the route.

eight-of-wands.upright: Disciplined action moves you forward in inspiration, ambition, and passion; stay aligned.
eight-of-wands.reversed: Burnout or fear of change blocks movement—adjust the route.

nine-of-cups.upright: Self-mastery and satisfaction bloom within relationships and emotional flow; savor the reward.
nine-of-cups.reversed: Overindulgence or isolation shows it is time to share the wealth.

nine-of-pentacles.upright: Self-mastery and satisfaction bloom within resources, body, and practical work; savor the reward.
nine-of-pentacles.reversed: Overindulgence or isolation shows it is time to share the wealth.

nine-of-swords.upright: Self-mastery and satisfaction bloom within thoughts, communication, and truth; savor the reward.
nine-of-swords.reversed: Overindulgence or isolation shows it is time to share the wealth.

nine-of-wands.upright: Self-mastery and satisfaction bloom within inspiration, ambition, and passion; savor the reward.
nine-of-wands.reversed: Overindulgence or isolation shows it is time to share the wealth.

ten-of-cups.upright: Legacy energy completes a cycle in relationships and emotional flow; think long-term.
ten-of-cups.reversed: Structural issues or misalignment call for redesign before continuing.

ten-of-pentacles.upright: Legacy energy completes a cycle in resources, body, and practical work; think long-term.
ten-of-pentacles.reversed: Structural issues or misalignment call for redesign before continuing.

ten-of-swords.upright: Legacy energy completes a cycle in thoughts, communication, and truth; think long-term.
ten-of-swords.reversed: Structural issues or misalignment call for redesign before continuing.

ten-of-wands.upright: Legacy energy completes a cycle in inspiration, ambition, and passion; think long-term.
ten-of-wands.reversed: Structural issues or misalignment call for redesign before continuing.

page-of-cups.upright: A curious messenger explores new relationships and emotional flow; stay teachable and playful.
page-of-cups.reversed: Impatience or distraction derails early lessons—slow down and listen.

page-of-pentacles.upright: A curious messenger explores new resources, body, and practical work; stay teachable and playful.
page-of-pentacles.reversed: Impatience or distraction derails early lessons—slow down and listen.

page-of-swords.upright: A curious messenger explores new thoughts, communication, and truth; stay teachable and playful.
page-of-swords.reversed: Impatience or distraction derails early lessons—slow down and listen.

page-of-wands.upright: A curious messenger explores new inspiration, ambition, and passion; stay teachable and playful.
page-of-wands.reversed: Impatience or distraction derails early lessons—slow down and listen.

knight-of-cups.upright: Driven pursuit propels relationships and emotional flow; channel all that momentum.
knight-of-cups.reversed: Restlessness or recklessness throws relationships and emotional flow off course.

knight-of-pentacles.upright: Driven pursuit propels resources, body, and practical work; channel all that momentum.
knight-of-pentacles.reversed: Restlessness or recklessness throws resources, body, and practical work off course.

knight-of-swords.upright: Driven pursuit propels thoughts, communication, and truth; channel all that momentum.
knight-of-swords.reversed: Restlessness or recklessness throws thoughts, communication, and truth off course.

knight-of-wands.upright: Driven pursuit propels inspiration, ambition, and passion; channel all that momentum.
knight-of-wands.reversed: Restlessness or recklessness throws inspiration, ambition, and passion off course.

queen-of-cups.upright: Magnetic mastery nurtures relationships and emotional flow with intuition and maturity.
queen-of-cups.reversed: Overextension or insecurity blurs boundaries—recenter your authority.

queen-of-pentacles.upright: Magnetic mastery nurtures resources, body, and practical work with intuition and maturity.
queen-of-pentacles.reversed: Overextension or insecurity blurs boundaries—recenter your authority.

queen-of-swords.upright: Magnetic mastery nurtures thoughts, communication, and truth with intuition and maturity.
queen-of-swords.reversed: Overextension or insecurity blurs boundaries—recenter your authority.

queen-of-wands.upright: Magnetic mastery nurtures inspiration, ambition, and passion with intuition and maturity.
queen-of-wands.reversed: Overextension or insecurity blurs boundaries—recenter your authority.

king-of-cups.upright: Visionary stewardship directs relationships and emotional flow with confidence and integrity.
king-of-cups.reversed: Control issues or rigidity limit relationships and emotional flow; invite flexibility.

king-of-pentacles.upright: Visionary stewardship directs resources, body, and practical work with confidence and integrity.
king-of-pentacles.reversed: Control issues or rigidity limit resources, body, and practical work; invite flexibility.

king-of-swords.upright: Visionary stewardship directs thoughts, communication, and truth with confidence and integrity.
king-of-swords.reversed: Control issues or rigidity limit thoughts, communication, and truth; invite flexibility.

king-of-wands.upright: Visionary stewardship directs inspiration, ambition, and passion with confidence and integrity.
king-of-wands.reversed: Control issues or rigidity limit inspiration, ambition, and passion; invite flexibility.

the-fool.upright: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity; trust the journey and embrace the unknown with open curiosity.
the-fool.reversed: Recklessness, naivety, missed opportunities; ground yourself before leaping.

the-magician.upright: Manifestation, resourcefulness, power; you have all the tools needed—use them with intention.
the-magician.reversed: Manipulation, untapped talent, scattered energy; refocus your abilities.

the-high-priestess.upright: Intuition, sacred knowledge, the subconscious; listen to your inner voice and trust what you know.
the-high-priestess.reversed: Secrets, disconnection, repressed feelings; reconnect with your intuition.

the-empress.upright: Abundance, nurturing, fertility; create beauty and embrace the natural flow of growth.
the-empress.reversed: Creative block, dependence, neglect; restore balance to give and receive.

the-emperor.upright: Authority, structure, control; establish order and take decisive action with confidence.
the-emperor.reversed: Domination, rigidity, lack of discipline; soften control or reclaim your power.

the-hierophant.upright: Tradition, spiritual wisdom, conformity; honor established systems and seek guidance from mentors.
the-hierophant.reversed: Rebellion, unconventional beliefs, restriction; question dogma and forge your own path.

the-lovers.upright: Love, harmony, alignment; make choices from the heart and honor meaningful connections.
the-lovers.reversed: Disharmony, imbalance, difficult choices; examine your values and relationships.

the-chariot.upright: Willpower, determination, victory; harness opposing forces and drive toward your goal with focus.
the-chariot.reversed: Lack of control, aggression, stalled progress; realign your direction.

strength.upright: Inner strength, courage, compassion; tame challenges with gentle persistence and brave authenticity.
strength.reversed: Self-doubt, weakness, raw emotion; reclaim your courage and self-control.

the-hermit.upright: Soul-searching, introspection, inner guidance; withdraw to find truth and illuminate your path.
the-hermit.reversed: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal; balance solitude with connection.

wheel-of-fortune.upright: Cycles, destiny, turning point; embrace change and trust the natural rhythm of life.
wheel-of-fortune.reversed: Bad luck, resistance, no control; surrender to the cycle and adapt.

justice.upright: Fairness, truth, law; seek balance and make decisions with clarity and integrity.
justice.reversed: Unfairness, dishonesty, avoidance; face consequences and restore accountability.

the-hanged-man.upright: Surrender, pause, new perspective; release control and see the situation from a different angle.
the-hanged-man.reversed: Stalling, resistance, indecision; stop waiting and take action.

death.upright: Transformation, endings, transition; release the old to make space for rebirth and renewal.
death.reversed: Resistance, stagnation, fear of change; embrace the necessary ending.

temperance.upright: Balance, moderation, patience; blend opposites with care and maintain steady, harmonious flow.
temperance.reversed: Imbalance, excess, lack of harmony; restore equilibrium and moderation.

the-devil.upright: Bondage, materialism, temptation; recognize unhealthy attachments and reclaim your freedom.
the-devil.reversed: Release, freedom, revelation; break chains and liberate yourself from restriction.

the-tower.upright: Sudden upheaval, revelation, awakening; structures crumble to reveal truth and rebuild stronger.
the-tower.reversed: Avoidance, fear of change, delayed disaster; face the necessary disruption.

the-star.upright: Hope, renewal, inspiration; trust the future and let healing light guide your path forward.
the-star.reversed: Despair, disconnection, lack of faith; reconnect with hope and inner light.

the-moon.upright: Illusion, intuition, the unconscious; navigate uncertainty and trust your instincts through the fog.
the-moon.reversed: Clarity, release of fear, deception revealed; truth emerges from confusion.

the-sun.upright: Joy, success, vitality; bask in clarity and celebrate the warmth of achievement and positivity.
the-sun.reversed: Temporary setback, dimmed enthusiasm; rediscover your inner light.

judgement.upright: Reflection, reckoning, rebirth; evaluate the past and step into a higher calling with clarity.
judgement.reversed: Self-doubt, lack of accountability, harsh judgment; practice self-forgiveness.

the-world.upright: Completion, accomplishment, integration; celebrate the full cycle and embrace wholeness.
the-world.reversed: Incompletion, delays, lack of closure; tie up loose ends before moving forward.
